pages.text: A player kept teleportation device. It can store power and like all Mekanism teleporters, energy drain increases with the distance the player teleports to.

Right-clicking with this device in hand will open a GUI similar to that of the full Teleporter, allowing instant travel to any Teleporters that the player has set up. The Portable Teleporter is capable of multidimensional travel.$(p)Note that in order for the Portable Teleporter to be functional, the complete Teleporter Portal structure does $(bold)not$() need to be built; only the Teleporter block must be present (and supplied with power).
